question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_atomic_claimable_rewards()] [Reward Sniping] Can a user monitor the mempool for large deposits/withdrawals by others, then front-run with their own claim at optimal global_index timing to maximize rewards? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_global_index()] [Rate Arbitrage] If rate changes between blocks, can sophisticated users time their queries to calculate_global_index() to always get the most favorable rate for reward accrual? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_atomic_claimable_rewards()] [Dust Attack] Can an attacker create many small reward positions that individually pass the `> 0` check at line 48 but collectively bloat the return vectors, causing gas exhaustion for legitimate users? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_user_reward()] [Balance Flash Loan] Can a user take a flash loan to temporarily inflate user_effective_supply/borrow, call this calculation, then repay the loan, all to boost their reward snapshot? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_atomic_claimable_rewards()] [Grief Attack] Can a malicious user intentionally create many rules with user_claimable_reward slightly above 0 to force expensive iteration for other users querying rewards? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_atomic_claimable_rewards()] [Unauthorized Query] Can any user query claimable rewards for any other user address at line 13, leaking financial information and enabling targeted attacks? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: verify_rule_id_config()] [Public Verification] Is this verification function at line 61 meant to be called only by authorized modules, or can any contract call it to validate arbitrary rule configurations? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_global_index()] [Internal Function Exposure] Should this function at line 73 be internal/private, or is it safely exposed as a private function that can't be called directly by users? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_user_reward()] [Direct Calculation Access] Can external contracts call this calculation function at line 93 directly to compute rewards without proper authorization checks? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Module: incentive_v3_getter] [Version Compatibility] Does this module properly handle the _v3 suffix, ensuring it only works with IncentiveV3 and not older versions that might have different data structures? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: verify_rule_id_config()] [Rule Schema Changes] If the Rule structure adds new fields, will the tuple destructuring at lines 36, 68, 74, 94 fail or silently ignore new critical fields? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_atomic_claimable_rewards()] [Empty Pool Handling] When vec_map::keys() returns empty at lines 22, 28, how does the function handle users with no pools or rules - does it return empty vectors or error? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_global_index()] [Maximum Duration] What happens when `now - last_update_at` at line 84 reaches maximum u64 value (584 billion years) - does the multiplication at line 88 handle this? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_user_reward()] [Maximum Index Diff] When user_index_diff at line 102 is at maximum u256, can ray_math::ray_mul() at line 104 still compute correctly or does it overflow? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_atomic_claimable_rewards()] [Single Rule Edge Case] When a user has exactly one claimable reward, are the parallel vectors at lines 49-53 correctly sized with length 1, or can off-by-one errors occur? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: verify_rule_id_config()] [Boundary Type Values] Does the u8 check_asset_id at line 61 properly validate against the full u8 range (0-255), or can boundary values (0, 255) cause assertion issues at line 65? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_global_index()] [Division Rounding] Does integer division `(rate * duration) / total_balance` at line 88 round down, and can accumulated rounding errors cause significant reward loss over many epochs? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_user_reward()] [Ray Math Rounding] Does ray_math::ray_mul() at line 104 round consistently, or can different rounding between users cause unfair reward distribution? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_atomic_claimable_rewards()] [Accumulated Precision Loss] When rewards are calculated across many rules (lines 32-55), can precision loss accumulate to significant amounts that favor early claimers over late claimers? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_atomic_claimable_rewards()] [Storage Poisoning] Can an attacker corrupt the Storage object passed at line 13 before calling get_effective_balance() at line 30 to return manipulated balance values? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_global_index()] [Total Balance Zero Race] Between checking total_balance == 0 at line 85 and using it as divisor at line 88, can total_balance become zero through concurrent transactions? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_user_reward()] [Index Initialization Attack] If get_user_index_by_rule() at line 102 returns 0 for new users, can users claim maximum rewards by intentionally not initializing their index?
